CustomField.formula:
IF(TEXT(Carrier__c) = "Red" && AND( OR( NOT((DLT_Origin__c)= "Ashford"),NOT((DLT_Origin__c)= "Ebbsfleet")),NOT((DLT_Origin__c)= "")),"Continental",
IF(TEXT(Carrier__c) = "Blue" && AND( OR( (DLT_Destination__c) = 'Ashford International', (DLT_Destination__c) = 'Ebbsfleet International')) , "London ", IF(TEXT(Carrier__c) = "Purple", "Both ", "") ) ) + IF( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Carrier__c))), IMAGE( "/resource/ticket/colors/tag_" + IF( TEXT(Carrier__c) = "Red", "red.png", IF( TEXT(Carrier__c) = "Blue", "blue.png", IF( TEXT(Carrier__c) = "Purple", "purple.png", "" ) ) ), "Ticket color image" ), "" )
CustomField.label: Carrier Flag
